name: Horse Plays
description:
"All the world’s a stage and all the men and women merely horses."

It's opening night at the local amateur theatre and these two horses are determined to break every leg they can find.

Can you help one brave equestrian thespian remember their lines, or will your fellow filly bolt from the stable in frustration?

Featuring at least three plays and possibly a secret one, Horse Plays is the daring new colt on the app circuit that you don't have to pony up a single cent for, and I am not trying to nag.
